title: Flagellum flagelli: or Doctor Bastwicks quarters beaten up in two or three Pomeridian exercises, by way of animadversion upon his first booke, intituled, Independency not Gods ordinance. / By J.S. M.A. Published by authoritie.
author: Sadler, John, 1615-1674.
publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, dwelling in Aldersgate-streete.,
